Module com.ning.breakout
Package com.ning.breakout.view

Class GameStatusBar

java.lang.Object
com.ning.breakout.view.GameStatusBar
public class GameStatusBar extends Object
GameStatusBar is the class visualizes the game status info.

The game status info includes:

  • the number of balls user still has (ball count)
  • the current level user is playing (level)
  • the number of bricks remained in the current level (brick count)
Author:
Ning ZHU

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameStatusBar()
    The class constructor initializes and sets the lay out of the ImageView and Label objects which used to visualize the ball count, level, brick count of the game, and adds these Javafx objects into a new container (which will be added to the bigger container in the game board to display the game status info).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    javafx.scene.Group
    getContainer()
    Returns the container of the ImageView and Label objects which used to visualize the game status info.
    void
    updateBallCountVisual(int count)
    Updates the source image of the ImageView object used to visualize the ball count when the ball count of the game changes.
    void
    updateBrickCountVisual(int count)
    Updates the text of the Label object used to visualize the brick count when the brick count of the game changes.
    void
    updateLevelVisual(int level)
    Updates the text of the Label object used to visualize the level when the level of the game changes.

    • updateBallCountVisual

      public void updateBallCountVisual(int count)
